name: Cinnamon Rolls
instructions: Remove cinnamon rolls from tube and place into oven-safe dish.

name: Pot Roast
instructions: Season the chuck roast with salt and pepper.
Sear the roast over medium high heat.
Combine roast, potatoes, onion, and carrots in an oven-safe dish.

name: Baked Potato
instructions: Bake potato at 375 F for 45 minutes.
